name: cdk
description: This is a blank project for Java development with CDK.

scripts.repository:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.DockerRepositoryApp" -c applicationName=test-app -c accountId=797515232705 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.repository:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.DockerRepositoryApp" -c applicationName=test-app -c accountId=797515232705 -c region=eu-central-1 --force --require-approval never
scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.NetworkApp" -c sslCertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:eu-central-1:797515232705:certificate/3f2cbcba-58a1-415f-8918-7de02c94cc56 -c environmentName=test -c accountId=797515232705 -c region=eu-central-1 --require-approval never
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.NetworkApp" -c sslCertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:eu-central-1:797515232705:certificate/3f2cbcba-58a1-415f-8918-7de02c94cc56 -c environmentName=test -c accountId=797515232705 -c region=eu-central-1 --force --require-approval never
scripts.service:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.ServiceApp" -c accountId=797515232705 -c region=eu-central-1 -c applicationName=test-app -c springProfile=aws -c environmentName=test -c dockerImageUrl=docker.io/stratospheric/todo-app-v1:latest --force --require-approval never
scripts.service:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.myorg.ServiceApp" -c accountId=797515232705 -c region=eu-central-1 -c applicationName=test-app -c springProfile=aws -c environmentName=test -c dockerImageUrl=docker.io/stratospheric/todo-app-v1:latest --force --require-approval never
